sections.text: 478.54 Exemptions.—This chapter does not apply to the delivery of electrolysis services by:

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Board” means the Board of Medicine
sections.text: (2)“Council” means the Electrolysis Council.(3)“Department” means the Department of Health.(4)“Electrologist” means a person who engages in the practice of electrolysis.(5)“Electrolysis or electrology” means the permanent remov

sections.heading: Exemptions. This chapter does not apply to the delivery of electrolysis services by:(1)A physician licensed under chapter 458 or an osteopathic physician licensed under chapter 459; or(2)A student delivering electrolysis services to another in an approved electrolysis training program
